full_text:
NO WAIVER OF RIGHTS.

	Except for bona fide collective bargaining agreements, any waiver by a Hotel Worker of any or all of the provisions of this article shall be deemed contrary to public policy and shall be void and unenforceable.  Any attempt by a Hotel Employer to have a Hotel Worker waive rights given by this article shall constitute a violation of this article.

7.catch_line: Coexistence With Other Available Relief For Specific Deprivations Of Protected Rights.

next_section.catch_line: Coexistence With Other Available Relief For Specific Deprivations Of Protected Rights.

plain_text:
LOS ANGELES MUNICIPAL CODE

NO WAIVER OF RIGHTS. (§ 184.06)

  NO WAIVER OF RIGHTS.	Except for bona fide collective bargaining agreements,
any waiver by a Hotel Worker of any or all of the provisions of this article
shall be deemed contrary to public policy and shall be void and unenforceable. 
Any attempt by a Hotel Employer to have a Hotel Worker waive rights given by
this article shall constitute a violation of this article.
